select count(*) from (SELECT A .USER_ID as userId,SUBSTR(d.jzrq, 1, 6) as month,dept.name as deptName,p.product_name as productName,e.display_name as displayName,sum(D .df) as total FROM BASIC_CUSTOMER_INFORMATION A, CUSTOMER_APPLICATION_INFO B, TY_REPAY_LSZ D ,SYS_DEPT_USER deptuser,SYS_DEPARTMENT dept,SYS_USER e , product_attribute p WHERE A .USER_ID=deptuser.USER_ID and deptuser.DEPT_ID=dept.id and A .USER_ID=e.id and A.ID=B.CUSTOMER_ID and B.JJH=D.JJH and p.id = b.product_id
and D.QXRX=#{fdate}
and p.product_name like '%'||#{product}||'%'
GROUP BY SUBSTR(d.jzrq, 1, 6),A .USER_ID,e.display_name,dept.name,p.product_name ORDER BY A .USER_ID,SUBSTR(d.jzrq, 1, 6),dept.name)
